# IAGAI Skillset: Junior Dev (Top 10)

## Use order (default)

1. `skills/iagai-workflow`
2. `skills/change-planning`
3. `skills/repo-orientation`
4. implement with explanations
5. `skills/test-authoring`

## The 10 skills

1. `skills/iagai-workflow`
2. `skills/change-planning`
3. `skills/repo-orientation`
4. `skills/debug-triage`
5. `skills/test-authoring`
6. `skills/safe-refactor`
7. `skills/doc-coauthoring`
8. `skills/a11y-review`
9. `skills/pr-review-and-suggestions`
10. `skills/webapp-testing`
